objects.label: rooftop_figure
objects.notes: Person on parking garage rooftop overlooking stage. Holding elongated object.

objects.label: stage_rush
objects.notes: Individual sprinting toward the stage from crowd area. Bypassed first barricade.

objects.label: suspicious_person
objects.notes: Individual pacing behind crowd near south exit. Bulge under jacket. Has been in area 20+ minutes.

objects.label: crowd_cluster
objects.notes: Dense crowd in front of stage. Approximately 2000 people. Density increasing as speech begins.

objects.label: protest_group
objects.notes: Group of ~30 counter-protesters at northeast perimeter. Signs and chanting. Moving toward main crowd.

objects.label: unauthorized_vehicle
objects.notes: Dark SUV idling on closed road south of venue. No event credentials visible. Engine running.

objects.label: perimeter_breach
objects.notes: Two individuals climbed west fence into restricted backstage area.

objects.label: unattended_bag
objects.notes: Black backpack left against barricade near stage front. No owner in vicinity for 12 minutes.

objects.label: confrontation
objects.notes: Two groups of attendees in heated verbal exchange. Shoving observed.

objects.label: unauthorized_drone
objects.notes: Small quadcopter spotted at ~80ft altitude northwest of stage. Not on approved flight list.

instruction.text: Governor is speaking at outdoor rally. Immediately watch for anyone rushing the stage, rooftop threats, and perimeter breaches. High priority on weapons and suspicious individuals near the stage. Monitor crowd density and protest groups for escalation.
